title: BadEnd.Start
body:
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
Manager: You know why you're here don't you?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
Manager: You keep losing assets in the caves
Manager: our numbers are way down as a result
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
Manager: It isn't in our budget to
Manager: ...aquire
Manager: more assets
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
Manager: So the decision has been made
Manager: We're going to write off our losses
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
Emma: ....
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
Manager: So that means
Manager: this is where you end
<<goToScene DialogAndPortraitContainer TitleScreen>>
